metadata.Title: CVE-2012-3458 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Beaker before 1.6.4, when using PyCrypto to encrypt sessions, uses AES in ECB cipher mode, which might allow remote attackers to obtain portions of sensitive session data via unspecified vectors.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-3458` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-beaker - 1.6.4
python3-beaker - 1.6.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: beaker package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.6.4').
